headline: Is Apollo Global Management (APO) One of the Most Undervalued Large Cap Stocks to Invest in Now?
summary: Apollo Global Management Inc. (NYSE:APO) is one of the most undervalued large cap stocks to invest in now. On January 13, UBS analyst Michael Brown reduced the firm’s price target on Apollo Global to $182 from $186, while maintaining a Buy rating on the shares. On January 9, Barclays lowered its price target for Apollo […]
